about_the_game:
Katy and Bob — let's open a wedding bakery! Want to dive into the wedding plan with Katy & Bob: Cake Café soundtracks?
You can go on a wedding world at any time!
We have collected for you great soundtracks, which will help to feel wedding atmosphere.

List of soundtracks:
Track 1 - 01:36
Track 2 - 00:28
Track 3 - 00:32
Track 4 - 00:32
Track 5 - 01:35
Track 6 - 01:28
Track 7 - 00:32

Note:
All soundtrack are in the format .mp3
Album's soundtrack will be placed in a folder containing the game Katy & Bob: Cake Café.
